thread.title: BRIEF-Rti Surgical Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $0.14

title: BRIEF-Rti Surgical Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $0.14
text: March 1, 2018 / 10:41 AM / in 24 minutes BRIEF-Rti Surgical Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $0.14 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Rti Surgical Inc: * RTI SURGICAL ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $280 MILLION TO $290 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $70.8 MILLION VERSUS $71.3 MILLION * COMPANY REITERATED FISCAL 2018 GUIDANCE ISSUED IN JANUARY 2018‍​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03, REVENUE VIEW $69.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $281.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
